acf.description: We have won the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 award for the fastest growing young company in Central Europe and we are looking for new colleagues who will help us move our project forward! Seize the opportunity and become a part of the fast-growing startup FTMO.com.  We are looking for a new colleague to help us grow by helping us test our applications.  Do you hate mistakes and imperfections?  Then we are looking for you.  We work with modern technologies and you will have many opportunities for self-realization.

expectations.title: Full-time in a modern office in the center of Prague with the possibility of home office.
Key responsibilities include manual + automated testing of our web applications / API services + mobile apps.
Cooperation with developers and customer support department.
Tech stack: Python, Gherkin, Git, SQL.
Our tools: Docker, Kubernetes, Grafana, Elastic, Gitlab, Postman, Asana, JetBrains IDE/VS Code.

knowledge.title: A motivated tester, who wants to be part of the development team and is keen to move forward.
At least 2 years of testing experience, automation experience or strong motivation to learn.
Experience with REST API, database systems (Postgre, MySQL).
Can you read technical documentation in English and understand what it says.
Experience with agile techniques is an advantage.
